org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign
Class AeAbstractCopyStrategyFactoryImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.assign.AeAbstractCopyStrategyFactoryImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeCopyStrategyFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
AeBPWSCopyStrategyFactoryImpl, AeWSBPELCopyStrategyFactoryImpl
public class AeAbstractCopyStrategyFactoryImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAeCopyStrategyFactory

Base factory used to create IAeCopyStrategy instances. These instances are used to implement the logic of the given copy operation.

Nested Class Summary
